GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.10.156
GSD.description:
ata: libata-transport: fix double ata_host_put() in ata_tport_add()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit ac471468f7c16cda2525909946ca13ddbcd14000, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 2623c7a5f2799569d8bb05eb211da524a8144cb3. For more details please see the references link.
